distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gdk2 fixes the following security issues:

- CVE-2015-7552: various overflows, including heap overflow in flipping bmp files (bsc#958963)

The following non-security issues were fixed:

- bsc#960155: fix a possible divide by zero
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

full_product_name.product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4:gtk2-x86-2.18.9-0.39.1.ia64

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 SP4

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the gdk_pixbuf_flip function in gdk-pixbuf-scale.c in gdk-pixbuf 2.30.x allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted BMP file.
notes.title: CVE description
